items.title: Browsing MyAnimeList without Login
items.description: Now it's possible to browse and search anime and manga titles on MyAnimeList without logging in first.

items.title: Shukofukurou Scrobble Share Extension Deprecated
items.description: The legacy Shukofukurou Scrobble Share Extension is now removed due to site changes on Crunchyroll and Funimation rendering the extension useless.

items.title: Crunchyroll Detection Improvements
items.description: Fixes detection of episode titles being the same as the show title, episode nunber detection, and the ability to update using Crunchyroll's watch history.
